name: Commodity Trading
description: Identifies commodity trading activities and assesses SIAP classification for energy, metals, agriculturals, and primary/secondary commodities. Excludes upstream operations, B2C retail sales, and financial instrument trading.
field: commodity, trading, energy, metals, agricultural, oil, gas, petrochemicals, minerals, soft commodities

Q1.text: Is the client directly involved in commodity trading through their business activity?
Q1.summary: Commodity Trading Verification - Is the client involved in commodity trading?

Q2.text: Is the client activity solely involved in mining, extraction, and processing of commodities (upstream operations)?
Q2.summary: Non-SIAP Exclusion - Upstream operations only check

Q3.text: Is the client activity solely involved in the sale of commodities to retail consumers (B2C)?
Q3.summary: Non-SIAP Exclusion - B2C retail sales check

Q4.text: Is the client activity solely involved in trading of financial instruments relating to commodities (e.g., trading, portfolio management, custody, investment securities)?
Q4.summary: Non-SIAP Exclusion - Financial instruments only check

Q5.text: Is the client involved in trading of energy commodities (including petrochemicals, electricity)?

Q6.text: Is the client involved in trading of metals (including minerals)?
Q6.summary: Commodity Type - Metals and minerals check

Q7.text: Is the client involved in trading of agriculturals or soft commodities?
Q7.summary: Commodity Type - Agricultural and soft commodities check

Q8.text: Is the client involved in trading of primary commodities that are extracted or captured directly from natural resources, or secondary commodities produced from processing primary resources (e.g., refined gold)?

Q9.text: Does the client have direct engagement in the commodity trading activity (not just passive investment or advisory role)?
Q9.summary: Direct Engagement - Active trading involvement check

Q10.text: Does the income from commodity trading activity represent more than 10% of the client's total income?

Q1_NO.reason: Client is not involved in commodity trading

Q2_YES.reason: Activity solely involves upstream operations (mining/extraction/processing) - not considered SIAP

Q3_YES.reason: Activity solely involves B2C retail sales - not considered SIAP

Q4_YES.reason: Activity solely involves trading of financial instruments - not considered SIAP

Q8_NO.reason: Client not involved in recognized commodity trading types

Q9_NO.reason: No direct engagement in commodity trading (passive investment or advisory only)

Q10_YES.reason: Direct commodity trading engagement with income >10% requires Enhanced Due Diligence

Q10_NO.reason: Direct commodity trading engagement but income <=10% - SIAP without Enhanced Due Diligence
